Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions

Composable transactions with error trace.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImmutableSource<IMMUTABLE>
    A source of an immutable object.
    Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    A Transaction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
    An asynchronous operation to be applied to an ImmutableReference.
    ImmutableReference<IMMUTABLE>
    An IsolationBlade to which transactions can be applied.
    SyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
    A synchronous operation to be applied to an ImmutableReference.
    TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>
    A composable transaction for updating an ImmutableReference.
